Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 1 Hetuduka, Tika » 1.12 Hetuduka, Parittattika » 1.12.1 Parittapada » 1.12.1.1--6 Paṭiccādivāra » Paccayacatukka
Nahetu-naārammaṇādi
Hetuduka, Tika
Hetuduka, Parittattika
Parittapada
Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
Nahetu-naārammaṇādi
357.
755Nahetuṃ parittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu paritto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā. Nahetuṃ parittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu paritto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā. (2)
756Hetuṃ parittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu paritto dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā. (1)
757Nahetuṃ parittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu paritto dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā. (1)
758Hetuṃ parittañca nahetuṃ parittañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu paritto dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā. (1)
759Hetuṃ parittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu paritto dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
358.
760Nahetuyā dve, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte nava, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
761Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
762Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe dve. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
763(Sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṃsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi paṭiccavārasadisā vitthāretabbā.)
